description: Dawn Lerman, a New York-based nutrition consultant and Well blog columnist, brought this recipe to The Times in the fall of 2015 It's a delicious sugar-free alternative to the traditional apple pie, and it's a cinch to put together.
title: Vegan Apple Pie Recipe
title_page: Vegan Apple Pie Recipe - NYT Cooking
